csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0">
  <info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated>
  </info>
  <macro name="edition-mac">
    <number variable="edition" font-style="italic"/>
  </macro>
  <citation>
    <layout delimiter="; ">
      <text macro="edition-mac" vertical-align="sup"/>
    </layout>
  </citation>
</style>
